LanguageData.RMTS.traitsMin: Minimum Number of Traits Per Pawn (Default: 2)
LanguageData.RMTS.traitsMax: Maximum Number of Traits Per Pawn (Default: 3)
LanguageData.RMTS.traitsNotes: Be aware that even if you set the maximum number of traits to zero, some pawns will still show up with traits, since some backgrounds force traits to be assigned.
